this_title: Faster! Humanity's Quest to Save Time Season 1
introduction: FASTER! Humanity’s Quest to Save Time, investigates the time-saving inventions we depend on and explores their impact on the world at large.S1 E1 - The ElevatorS1 E2 - The HighwayS1 E3 - The Shopping MallS1 E4 - The Plastic ContainerS1 E5 - The MicrowaveS1 E6 - The Disposable CupS1 E7 - The Bar CodeS1 E8 - The DishwasherProducers: CuriosityStream, Canal+Studio: DBcom
